title: Lung Cancer-associated variants tested by MPRAs in lung cells - A549 & H520 (for more details, see https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ajhg.2024.05.021)

columns.name: GWAS_Locus
columns.label: GWAS Locus
columns.description: Lung cancer loci based on three GWASs

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.FDR.(A549_DMSO)
columns.label: ALT vs REF FDR (A549_DMSO)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in A549 lung adenocarcinoma cell line with DMSO control

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.log2FC.(A549_DMSO)
columns.label: ALT vs REF log2FC (A549_DMSO)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in A549 with DMSO

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.FDR.(A549_BaP)
columns.label: ALT vs REF  FDR (A549_BaP)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in A549 with Benzo[a]pyrene treatment

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.log2FC.(A549_BaP)
columns.label: ALT vs REF log2FC (A549_BaP)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in A549 with Benzo[a]pyrene

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.FDR.(H520_DMSO)
columns.label: ALT vs REF FDR (H520_DMSO)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in H520 lung squamous cell carcinoma cell line with DMSO control

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.log2FC.(H520_DMSO)
columns.label: ALT vs REF log2FC (H520_DMSO)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in H520 with DMSO

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.FDR.(H520_BaP)
columns.label: ALT vs REF FDR (H520_BaP)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in H520 with Benzo[a]pyrene treatment

columns.name: ALT.vs.REF.log2FC.(H520_BaP)
columns.label: ALT vs REF log2FC (H520_BaP)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in H520 with Benzo[a]pyrene

columns.name: Activator.A549
columns.label: Activator A549
columns.description: Either allele shows higher normalized expression than the average of all the variants tested in A549

columns.name: Activator.H520
columns.label: Activator H520
columns.description: Either allele shows higher normalized expression than the average of all the variants tested in H520

columns.name: Cell-type.regression.interaction.FDR
columns.label: Cell-type regression interaction FDR
columns.description: FDR of regression testing (Allele*Cell_Type) interaction between A549-DMSO condition and H520-DMSO condition

columns.name: Cell.type.specificity
columns.label: Cell type specificity
columns.description: Cell type with stronger allelic effect at interaction FDR > 0.01

columns.name: Integrative.score.from.Long.et.al.
columns.label: Integrative score from Long et al.
columns.description: Score combining MPRA allelic effect, activator, TF motif and chromatin features
